H0.text: In 1842, what was ceded to Britain by the Treaty of Nanking. Macau

H1.text: In 1842, what was ceded to Britain by the Treaty of Nanking. Taiwan

H2.text: In 1842, what was ceded to Britain by the Treaty of Nanking. Shanghai

H3.text: In 1842, what was ceded to Britain by the Treaty of Nanking. HK

A4.text: Hong Kong Island was ceded in the Treaty of Nanking on 29 August 1842

A5.text: The island of Hong Kong was ceded in perpetuity to Great Britain in accordance with Article III of the Treaty of Nanking of 1842
